docs.snippet: Readers of The Times’s personal technology section had lots of questions. Here we highlight the most compelling — in terms of their connection to current events or in reader response.

docs.snippet: The Kitchen by W&P Design, a shop open to the end of the year in NoLIta, has gifts and special tasting events.

docs.snippet: Le Thé Blanc from Kusmi Tea is a white tea delicately scented with raspberry and rose.

docs.snippet: Il Laboratorio del Gelato has opened a second branch that mimics the original.

docs.snippet: Kaleb Freitas, 30, died after the stage he was performing on collapsed on Sunday during the Atmosphere dance music festival in Esteio, Brazil.

headline.print_headline: D.J. Dies When Stage Topples in Brazil
headline.main: Brazilian D.J. Dies After Stage Collapses at Dance Music Festival

docs.snippet: The most-liked, commented on and shared New York Times article in 2017 was about a couple from Spokane, Wash.

headline.print_headline: An Elderly Couple Named Harvey and Irma Offered a Respite From the Summer’s Storms
headline.main: An Elderly Couple Named Harvey and Irma Offered a Respite From the Summer’s Storms

docs.snippet: Think of this maple syrup infused with ginger root as a holiday helper to give baked goods and cocktails more oomph.

docs.snippet: The photographer Julius Motal stumbled upon a “cat night” at a Brooklyn bar. From there, he rode the wave from one cat extravaganza to the next.
